Reviews.Title: Customer Service was Surprisingly VERY Good
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Rott
Reviews.Content: The setup of the DVR is quite easy and it allows the opportunity to choose your own harddrive (I went with a 2 TB option).However, I originally had an issue with the remote viewing (via computer and url as well as remote viewing apps).  It seemed like the remote viewing didn't really work on droid mobile devices.I had enough of trying to figure it out and found the company website [...] and submitted a request for help.  It took a bit of back and forth, but they were able to fix all of the issues (happened to be outdated remote monitoring apps) and were very helpful.I originally would not have recommended this DVR...but, after getting some help and getting it up and running, I would definitely recommend it.Good price, good product...just be ready to maybe download / install a different app than expected / provided...and maybe keep their website handy!

With newest third generation P2P/ Plug and play in security industry, no need to set DNNS and network port
